results.title: gRPC - .NET
results.description: gRPC Tip Th... While REST is widely implemented, a newer communication technology, gRPC, has gained tremendous momentum across the cloud-native community. What is gRPC? gRPC is a modern, high-performance framework that evolves the age-old remote procedure call (RPC) protocol. At the application level, gRPC streamlines messaging between clients and.

results.title: Create a .NET gRPC client and server in ASP.NET Core
results.description: Tutorial: Create a gRPC client and server in ASP.NET Core This tutorial shows how to create a .NET gRPC client and an ASP.NET Core gRPC Server. At the end, you'll have a gRPC client that communicates with the gRPC Greeter service. In this tutorial, you: Create a gRPC Server. Create a gRPC client. Test the gRPC client with the gRPC Greeter service..
